name: BonTNLPSolver
brief: Abstract interface for NLP solvers used in branch-and-bound

algorithms.name:
NLP Solver Abstraction for B&B (Ipopt/FilterSQP Backend)

Provides a generic interface for calling NLP solvers to solve continuous
relaxations of MINLPs. This abstraction allows Bonmin to use different
NLP solvers (Ipopt, FilterSQP) interchangeably.

**Key methods:**
- OptimizeTNLP(): Solve an NLP from scratch
- ReOptimizeTNLP(): Resolve with warm start (for B&B efficiency)
- setWarmStart()/getWarmStart(): Manage warm start information
- enableWarmStart()/disableWarmStart(): Control warm starting

**Return statuses:**
- solvedOptimal: Problem solved to optimality
- provenInfeasible: Infeasibility proven
- iterationLimit/timeLimit: Resource limits reached
- computationError/exception: Solver failures

Implementations: BonIpoptSolver (Ipopt), BonFilterSolver (FilterSQP)

see: IpTNLP.hpp for the NLP problem interface
